mapper.insert: insert into package_group (id, package_id, code, group_name, is_main, total, create_by, create_at, last_update_by, last_update_at, is_deleted, tenant_id, branch_id, version, local_id, quantity_required) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{packageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{code,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isMain,jdbcType=BIT}, #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{tenantId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{branchId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{localId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{quantityRequired,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update:
update package_group
package_id = #{packageId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
code = #{code,jdbcType=CHAR},
group_name = #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_main = #{isMain,jdbcType=BIT},
total = #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER},

tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT},
local_id = #{localId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
quantity_required = #{quantityRequired,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM package_group WHERE tenant_id=${tenantId} AND package_id=#{packageId} AND is_deleted=0 AND is_main=1
